title: Coronavirus: Austria reopens some shops as lockdown eased
description: Garden centres and small shops will open as part of a step-by-step plan to restart the economy.
content:
Image copyrightAFPImage caption
 In Austria it is compulsory to wear masks in supermarkets and other places selling food and medicine
